plot: A corporate chain offers to buy the Paddy's Pub, leaving Dee and Charlie unemployed and forcing them to find jobs at another restaurant, where they abuse their positions and take advantage of the manager, who is Dee's friend.

When the gang gets an offer that a corporate company wants to buy Paddy's Pub, they accept leaving Dee and Charlie with no work. While looking for work, Dee runs into the waitress at a restaurant and gets a job working with her which doesn't work out so good, and at the same time Charlie gets a job as a janitor at a school.—James Hake
